text: Pare amara sukrabinduke parinata kari ‘alaka-te, atahpara ‘alaka-ke parinata kari gosatapinde, atahpara gosatapindake parinata kari asthite; atahpara asthike dheke de'i gosata diye; tarapara take gare tuli an'ya eka srstirupe [1]. Ata'eba, (dekhe nina) sarbottama srasta [2] allah‌ kata barakatamaya
